Discharge

Your healthcare team will work closely with you to make sure that you have the information and resources you need to ensure a seamless continuation of your care and recovery.

Throughout your stay various members of your health care team will discuss your discharge instructions with you.

    Confirm the following with your healthcare team:
  • The recommended steps that you should follow with regarding your diet,medication and activity
  • Your follow-up appointment, wound care and medication prescriptions
    Make sure that you take the following with you:
  • Radiology reports and scans.
  • Orthopaedic appliances, such as crutches.
  • Electronic appliances and cables.
  • Personal items.
  • Chronic medication.

Whether you are going home, rehabilitation or a step-down facility, we strive to ensure a smooth transition of care between the hospital and your destination.

If, for any reason, you are concerned about leaving the hospital and your transition home. Please bring this to the attention of your healthcare team.
